summary.para: Contains classes that implement the functionality of the PropertyGridControl. To use these classes in XAML code, add the xmlns:dxprg="" namespace reference.

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid lines should be visible in the property grid. This is a dependency property.

member.value: true, to show the grid lines in the property grid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.PropertyGridControl.TrimDisplayText

member.value: true, to display only the name of the class; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Lists values that specify how properties are filtered.
Filters only by header content.
Filters both by header content and value.
Filters only by value.
Lists values that specify how grid data is sorted.
Sorts grid data by property headers in ascending order.
Sorts grid data using a custom sorting rule, implemented within the event handler.
Sorts grid data in definition order. Properties having no definitions are located below properties that have definitions.
Sorts grid data by definition headers in descending order.
Doesn't sort grid data.
Uses the value of the property.
Contains information about a data row.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.Children

summary.para: Gets a collection of objects that store information about corresponding child rows.

member.value: A collection of RowInfo objects that contain information about the current row's children.

summary.para: Gets the display name shown by the row.
Gets the display text shown by the row.
Gets the row value object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.FullPath

summary.para: Gets the full path to the data field displayed by the row. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A value that is the path to the data field.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.HasPropertyDefinition

summary.para: Gets whether the row has any appropriate property definitions.

member.value: true, if the row corresponds to any property definition; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Gets the actual row header.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.IsAttached

summary.para: Gets whether the row represents an attached property.

member.value: true if the row represents an attached property; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.IsCategory

summary.para: Gets whether the row is a category description.

member.value: true, if the row is a category description; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.IsReadOnly

summary.para: Gets whether the row is read-only.

member.value: true if the row is read-only; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.IsVisible

summary.para: Gets whether the row is visible.

member.value: true, if the row is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.Path

summary.para: Gets the path to the database field displayed by the row. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A value that is the name of a data field.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.RowInfo.Type

summary.para: Gets the type of data displayed by the row.

member.value: The of data displayed by the row.

summary.para: Lists values that specify when a Property Grid displays the Property Menu.
The property menu is shown by clicking the menu button or right-clicking the property.
The property menu is shown only by clicking the menu button.
The property menu is shown only by right-clicking the property.
Lists values that specify which properties are shown.
Display all properties in the underlying data source.
Display only properties that are defined in XAML.
Lists the values that specify the rules of type matching between the properties in the data source and the PropertyGrid's property definitions.
Property definition of type T is linked to a data source's property of type T.
Property definition of type T is linked to a data source's property that can be assigned to T.
Provides data for the event.
This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.value: An object that represents the validation error's content.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.ValidateCellEventArgs.ErrorType

summary.para: Gets the error type.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies the error type.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.ValidateCellEventArgs.IsValid

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the value is valid.

member.value: true, if the value is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.ValidateCellEventArgs.NewValue

summary.para: Gets a new value of the cell to be validated.

member.value: A that is the newly entered data.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.PropertyGrid.ValidateCellEventArgs.OldValue

member.value: A that is the cell's previous value.

member.value: A object that stores information about the row whose cell is validated.

member.value: A object that contains the error message.
